content:
Per our call today, I've created four Jira issues to capture the feedback we discussed:

  • FHIR-32323
  • FHIR-32324
  • FHIR-32325
  • FHIR-32326

I added my own ballot vote on these; would encourage others to pile on where have alignment (FYI @Matt Randall @Isaac Vetter @Madhav @Jason Vogt @Adam Culbertson, @Brett Marquard) -- and even if you didn't sign up for the ballot you can still leave comments in Jira.
